text: ye cho tum ho jo unase prem karate ho aur ve tumase prem nahin karate, jabaki tum samast kitaabon par eemaan rakhate ho. aur ve jab tumase milate hai to kahane ko to kahate hai ki "ham eemaan lae hai." kintu jab ve alag hote hai to tumapar krodh ke maare daanton se ungaliyaan kaatane lagate hai. kah do, "tum apane krodh mein aap maro. nissandeh allaah dilon ke bhed ko jaanata hai.
